5.58. 
Transfer of the right to accept the succession
1. If an heir who inherits by operation of law or by will dies after the creation of the succession without having accepted it within the prescribed time limit (Article 5.50 of this Code), the right to accept his/her share shall pass to his/her heirs.
2. This right of the deceased heir may be exercised by his heirs jointly within three months from the date on which the succession becomes theirs.
